item.title: Moving away from Gmail
item.description: So yea, it happened to one more person, I finaly got fed up with Gmail. So, why? Let’s get through the obvious things first. google bad! google steal data! google bad Now that we have that out of the way, let’s get to actual things. Google’s constant “harassment” Pretty much from the day i hit around 10 gigs used on my Google account, Google was constantly harrasing me and telling me to buy more storage.
